summary: Expands the crafting in Skyrim by adding many more crafting recipes and items. This includes modest things like books, flutes, drums, baskets of flowers, brooms, torches, lockpicks and crates of mead to wonderful golden statues, skeleton totems and arrows, that need feathers to be crafted.
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=8]Crafting[/SIZE][SIZE=20][COLOR=Gold]+[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]By Yetu[/SIZE]


[SIZE=6][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]Introduction[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]This mod adds many new items and crafting recipes, that are mainly in the MISC category. They are for decorational and roleplay purposes. Want to decorate your house with golden statues, or baskets of flowers ? Now you can, just craft (or buy) the item, drop it in your house and drag it to you desired spot. 

Or do you just want to make a living by crafting and smelting items, but don’t want to make sets of armor or expensive jewelry every day, but only some modest things like flutes, baskets and brooms for the sake of roleplaying ? 

Or perhaps you want to craft arrows and lockpicks, because you just don’t have enough ?

Then this mod is for you.
[/SIZE]


[SIZE=6][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]Features[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]
NEW ITEMS :
•	Golden Ship (Dwarven smithing required)
•	Moon and Star (Decoration only, Dwarven smithing required)
•	Crate of Mead
•	King’s Goblet (Dwarven smithing required)
•	Opened Chest
•	Skeleton Totem
•	Feathers (New buyable ingredient, also found on chicken. Used for arrows)
•	Animal fat (used for torches and candles, currently only buyable)
•	Empty Book (crafted only)
•	Sapphire Circlet Skull (Awesome for decorations)
NEW CRAFTING RECIPES :
•	Arrows (Iron-Daedric, various perks needed, better arrows need Hagraven feathers instead of normal ones)
•	Basket
•	Basket of Flowers
•	Broom
•	Candles (That’s right, a movable candles in a bowl that provide light)
•	Crate of Mead (Decoration only)
•	Dibella’s Statue (Steel smithing required)
•	Drum
•	Flute
•	Opened Chest (Decoration)
•	Empty Book
•	Lockpicks (10)
•	Paper roll (2) (made from ruined books)
•	Paper roll (made from severely ruined books)
•	Torch

[/SIZE]

[SIZE=6][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]How to Install[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]
1 (manual) – Extract the mod to a temporary folder on your desktop.  Install the mod by hand by moving the  >Crafting+.esp< in your Skyrim/DataFiles directory.
2 (NMM) - You know how it goes... ;)

OPTIONAL FILES (Probably incompatible with Crafting+.esp, so use only one):
Crafting+ [No Arrows].esp – This plugin removes the recipes for arrows, incase you already have a mod that adds them.

[/SIZE]
[SIZE=6][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]History[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]
-0.8beta
-0.9beta - added an optional .esp in the main file called \"Crafting+ [No Arrows].esp\", that removes the recipes for arrows, incase you already have a mod that adds them. (use only one .esp)

[/SIZE]
[SIZE=6][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]Known Bugs[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]
-None
[/SIZE]

[SIZE=6][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]Future Developments[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]
•	Add crafting recipes for (some) vanilla clothes and items
•	Add new items (probably with new meshes) that you will be able to craft
[/SIZE]

[/SIZE]
